quoteText:
You can also register via your accounts with the third-party providers Facebook, Twitter and Google.
When you register via the login details of a third-party provider, the provider will also process your personal data.
however, we will not have access to this information.
Information collected by the commenting function is made available to us via Disqus.
title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
